!You must pass individual tests to obtain marks. The *Mark of the Guildsman* is only given to those who pass the Trial of the Guildsman. You must be above *level 35* to take the test. To take the Trial of the Guildsman, visit *Warehouse Keeper Valkon of Giran Castle Town*. The *Mark of Prosperity* is only given to those who pass the Testimony of Prosperity. You must be above *level 37* to take the test. To take the Testimony of Prosperity, visit *Warehouse Keeper Parman of Giran Castle Town*. And finally, the *Mark of the Searcher* is only given to those who pass the Test of the Searcher. You must be above *level 39* to take the test. To take the Test of the Searcher, visit *Master Luther at the Hunters' Village*. [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30511/03.htm|Return]Â
